Name: AFTERBURN
About the game: IN A NUTSHELL Easy to pick up. All you need is the mouse or a single stick with two buttons. Daily mini-campaign. Each day missions are a bit different than the last. Endless mode. See how far you can go. Simple aircraft setup. 27 possible combinations to accomodate your play style. Arcade action. Score as much as you can, compete on the leaderboards. Quick to get into action. No deep story or cutscenes to suffer through, just dogfights. Quick installation. Minimum requirements but vibrant visuals.
